sources.title: Project A (1983) Jackie Chan vs Pirates: Kung-Fu Clash At Sea! Martial Arts Action Movie
sources.description:
In the high-seas hijinks of Project A, Sergeant Dragon Ma (Jackie Chan) and his daring coast guard team clash with ruthless pirates and corrupt officials in a whirlwind of kung-fu chaos and death-defying stunts. From a chaotic bar brawl to a heart-stopping clock tower plunge, Dragon, Inspector Hong Tin-tzu (Yuen Biao), and the roguish Fei (Sammo Hung) team up for an explosive showdown against the pirate lord San Pao (Dick Wei) in a thrilling adventure that defines Jackie Chan's fearless spirit.


Original title: A計劃 (A Gai3 Waak6)
Alternative title: Jackie Chan's Project A, Super Fighter

Director: Jackie Chan, Sammo Hung 
Writers: Jackie Chan, Edward Tang

Main cast:
Jackie Chan - Sergeant Dragon Ma Yue Lung
Sammo Hung - Zhuo Yifei (Fei / Fats)
Yuen Biao - Inspector Hong Tin-tzu
Dick Wei - Pirate Chief Lor Sam Pau (San Pao)
Mars - Big Mouth / Jaws
Isabella Wong - Winnie Shih

Genres: Action, Adventure, Comedy
Release date: December 22, 1983
Filming location: Hong Kong

Availability varies by region
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdbtxZGahjOpER2huEhTG9Rb

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: In late 19th Century Hong Kong the British may rule the land, but the pirates rule the waters. Reluctantly, the Coast Guard is given money to fight these pirates, but the pirates themselves have many contacts (that is, bribed officials) in the government, and seek to thwart the Coast Guard's efforts to eliminate them. One Coast Guard officer is Dragon Ma, who is determined that his beloved Coast Guard will not be made fools of.
metadata.Actors: Jackie Chan, Sammo Kam-Bo Hung, Biao Yuen
